comment.author: 95374975@N02
comment._content: I have never seen pictures of this but this was taken at the site of what we call the "Drummer Dam"...a state owned property off from Drummer Road in North Keene...It was our playground as kids and my Dad used to tell me that in his younger days as a child it was quite the recreation area with a rope tow and picnic tables...back in the twenties and probably thirties I would guess when he was a boy. The dam is still there and it is a very small pond, but I am certain that this is where the photo was taken.
